input.sentences: we joined partners in hope to help restore this country .
we taught them irrigation techniques | gardening and sewing .
they are now on their way to being self sufficient .
they are very grateful we helped them with so many different things .
we all posed for a pretty picture i can have back home .
output.sentences: Partners from around the world joined in to restore hope and faith.
The locals taught us some interesting techniques in sewing.
There might not be enough money for the locals, but there is sufficient hope and love.
Everyone helped out with the planting, and the locals were so grateful for it.
At the end, we all posed for a pretty farewell picture.
